name: SetVehicleParamsEx
notes:
The alarm will not reset when finished, you'll need to reset it by yourself with this function.
 Lights also operate during the day (Only when ManualVehicleEngineAndLights is enabled).
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3c  and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Sets a vehicle's parameters for all players.
params_title: (vehicleid, engine, lights, alarm, doors, bonnet, boot, objective)

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the parameters of.

params_body.name: alarm
params_body.description: Vehicle alarm status. If on, the alarm starts.  0 - Off, 1 - On.

params_body.name: objective
params_body.description: Toggle the objective arrow above the vehicle.  0 - Off, 1 - On.

return_values: 0: The function failed to execute. This means the vehicle does not exist.
related_fn:
